content:
path /v3/one/block/current
operationId OneGetCurrentBlock
summary Get current block number
description 1 credit per API call
Get ONE current block number This is the number of the latest block in the blockchain
responses
200
schema
type array
OneBlockCurrent
type object
properties
shardID
type number
description Shard ID
blockNumber
type number
description Current block number in this shard
description OK
